feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
